## Source: ossf-package-analysis (7ffc9bc5c2f4d591889c48fe55592f79ae8732b2228273d3d884793bd9d7c024)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'ssf-desktop-api-browser' @ 99.99.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
